name: Bank List
description:
#### Nigerian Bank List

Get a list of all supported banks and their codes.

Endpoint: /bank_list  
Method: GET

#### Header

| Param | Type | Required? | Decription |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| _authorization_ | string | Yes | Set value to _Bearer SECRET_KEY_ |

#### Path Parameters

| Param | Type | Required? | Decription |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| _currency_ | string | Yes | Default value is _NGN_ when not set |

steps.name: Response is a JSON object with success, message, currency, and data properties
Each element in the data array has bank_name and bank_code properties
